description._content: ID: 062474 Title: Ten Views in the Island of Antigua Illustrator: "Clark, William (William Clark)" Provenance: Thomas Clay: London, 1823 Caption: Slaves working on a plantation Notes: Planting the sugar cane. Image taken from Ten Views in the Island of Antigua, in which are represented theprocess of sugar making, and the employment of the negroes...From drawings made by W. Clark, etc. (With descriptive letterpress). Originally published/produced in Thomas Clay: London, 1823.
